blogPost.excerpt: Meetcode tech interview helps companies to accelerate & scale hiring by integrating the need of face-to-face communication and key competencies evaluation, including library of 250+ questions, 20+programming languages and developers’ preferred built-in IDE.
blogPost.body: Meetcode tech interview helps companies to accelerate & scale hiring by integrating the need of face-to-face communication and key competencies evaluation, including library of 250+ questions, 20+programming languages and developers’ preferred built-in IDE.
blogPost.title: Meetcode - Find top developers effortlessly by online code interview
blogPost.author: Meetcode

localize.description: Meetcode技术面试通过整合面对面交流和关键能力评估的需求，包括250+问题库、20+编程语言和开发人员首选的内置IDE，帮助企业加速和扩大招聘。
localize.tagline: 通过在线代码面试，毫不费力地找到顶尖的开发人员。

localize.description: Meetcode技術面試通過整合面對面交流和關鍵能力評估的需求，包括250+問題庫、20+編程語言和開發人員首選的內置IDE，幫助企業加速和擴大招聘。
localize.tagline: 通過在線代碼面試，毫不費力地找到頂尖的開發人員。
